name: muttle
description: Web application to develop student software testing habits through improved testing feedback.
author: Jon Lai <jlai12@calpoly.edu>

scripts.install-all: yarn install && yarn run install-frontend && yarn run install-backend
scripts.build: yarn run build-frontend && yarn run build-backend
scripts.clean: yarn run clean-frontend && yarn run clean-backend
scripts.clean-install: yarn run clean-install-frontend && yarn run clean-install-backend
scripts.clean-install-frontend: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules/ && yarn install --frozen-lockfile
scripts.clean-install-backend: cd backend && rm -rf node_modules/ && yarn install --frozen-lockfile
